name: Svackshee Sansthan

address: Svackshee Sansthan, Care of Y. Joshi, House No. 423,
Sheesh Ram, 2/50, Kala Kuan, Housing Board, Aravali Vihar,

briefDescription: Svackshee is working with rural communities to help promote voluntary action and community based knowledge in improving their own lives. We run 3 experimental schools for deprived communities and reached out to 350 children.Svackshee Experimental School is unique in many aspects –•	We provide freedom of pace of Learning to children.•	To ensure quality education teacher student ratio is kept 1:25•	Curriculum inculcates and emphasizes on using local knowledge and environment for learning•	Drawing, drama, songs, games and other creative skills are an integral part of the curriculum.•	School has no place for forced discipline and punishment.•	Children including girls feel safe and secure•	Toilets are provided for boys and girls

address: Svackshee Sansthan, c/o Y. Joshi, House No. 423
Sheesh Ram, 2/50, Kala Kuan, Housing Board, Aravali Vihar,
